name: Lemon Berry Parfait
description: Pucker up with luscious, made-in-the-microwave lemon curd and fresh berries! Assemble ahead in prep bowls for an instant treat through the week. A delish dessert under 100 calories that is sure to impress.
preparation: Divide half the berries between four Prep Bowls. Add lemon curd (about 2 tbsp per bowl). Top with remaining berries.

products.name: Luscious Lemon Curd Mix (Pack of 2)
summary: With our fool-proof Luscious Lemon Curd Mix, wave goodbye to yolk separation and double boilers in favour of our fave kitchen tool: the microwave. Simply mix the blend with eggs & water and you’ve got sweet, lemony luscious curd in two minutes—talk about a game changer!
